original_text: who invited them to the sacrifices to their gods. The people ate the sacrificial meal and bowed down before these gods.
korean_text: 그 여자들이 자기 신들에게 제사할 때에 이스라엘 백성을 청하매 백성이 먹고 그들의 신들에게 절하므로

sentences.original_text: to the sacrifices to their gods
The people ate the sacrificial meal
and bowed down before these gods
